tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pharmaceutical_compliance_documents (
    document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_version INT,
    document_date DATE,
    document_status VARCHAR(50),
    document_owner VARCHAR(100),
    document_location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_documents (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name VARCHAR(255),
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  document_status VARCHAR(50),
  document_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE product_regulations (
  regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(255),
  regulatory_agency VARCHAR(100),
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
  product_id INT REFERENCES regulatory_documents(document_id)
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_documents (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name VARCHAR(255),
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  author_name VARCHAR(100),
  upload_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE product_information (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(100),
  manufacturer_name VARCHAR(100),
  manufacturing_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_agencies (
  agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_name VARCHAR(100),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  contact_email VARCHAR(100),
  contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE product_regulations (
  regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  regulatory_body VARCHAR(100),
  compliance_deadline DATE
);
